thread.title: Entrepreneur of The Week: Ahmad Al Mutawa, a Kuwaiti entrepreneur, business coach, public speaker
thread.title_full: Entrepreneur of The Week: Ahmad Al Mutawa, a Kuwaiti entrepreneur, business coach, public speaker

title: Entrepreneur of The Week: Ahmad Al Mutawa, a Kuwaiti entrepreneur, business coach, public speaker
text:
Entrepreneur of The Week: Ahmad Al Mutawa, a Kuwaiti entrepreneur, business coach, public speaker Article By Tamara Pupic Sunday, 11 October 2015 9:54 AM 
It has been reported many times that young people often prefer the security of public sector jobs, drawing a big salary and enjoying a luxury lifestyle. 
Ahmad Al Mutawa, a Kuwaiti entrepreneur, business coach, public speaker and social media enthusiast, decided that having a sense of purpose was more important and in 2009 set up Mubaader Services, a one-stop-shop clinic for small and medium businesses. 
In the last six to seven years, the company has supported a portfolio of 850 clients and projects in Kuwait and helped more than 80 businesses to establish themselves in the GCC, he told Zawya recently. 
With a bio already quite different from 75 percent of Kuwaitis opting for government jobs, Al Mutawa has taken one more step forward to help the Kuwaiti government set up a $2 billion National Fund for Welfare of Small and Medium-sized Enterprises, which will provide entrepreneurs with 80 percent financing for their projects, as well as many other benefits. 
“It's a very positive step. It is one of the biggest funds in the world [for SMEs],” he said about the fund raised by the Emir of Kuwait Sheikh Sabah Al Ahmad Al Jaber Al Sabah that should be launched this month, adding that it would be “good news for Kuwait's entrepreneurial community.” 
Al Mutawa is also CEO of Al Mutawa Consulting Group (ACG), a Kuwait-based consultancy specialising in three business lines - oil and gas, entrepreneurial studies and support, and training and seminars. 
When it comes to business coaching, inspirational videos uploaded on his Instagram profile, @mutawacg, have drawn attention of more than 58,000 followers. 
As a result of his achievements to help the wider community, as well as establish a successful business, Ahmad Al Mutawa is our latest Entrepreneur of the Week. 
Do you know an entrepreneur who deserves to be our Entrepreneur of the Week? Please send your nominations to neil.king@itp.com and tamara.pupic@itp.com 
For information, tips and advice on setting up a new business or insights from those who have taken the leap into the world of entrepreneurship, click on the Arabian Business StartUp section .
